name: Greetings from the cornhenge ( A weirdcore/traumacore game)
name_original: Greetings from the cornhenge ( A weirdcore/traumacore game)
description:
If you watched those videos on youtube called weirdcore pictures or something similar, well this is basically that but in videogame form. Its not even really a videogame, but more of a short experience.

Best way to play this game: Put on earphones, be relaxed, turn off the lights (if you want to).

There are some secrets in the game, an example: The install license agreement

This is a simple point n click type of a game, so dont expect too much out of it. There are multiple endings depending on your choices. The game takes roughly 10 minutes (or less) to complete if you try to get all the endings.

There are 2 versions of this game:

1. The one when you complete an ending, and then have to exit the game via the windows button (meaning that you are leaving the weirdcore state).

2. The streamer friendly one where there is a retry button at the every ending screen which takes you back to the beggining, meaning you dont have to quit the game every time through the windows button.

The pictures were not made by me, they were taken from across the internet and I am sorry that I cant credit whoever made them.

SOUNDTRACK CREDITS AND SPOILERS BEYOUND THIS WARNING! :

Every song in the game was taken from another game called : Yume Nikki

I tried to find a contact of the developer of that game to ask for permission to use the ost, but I wasnt able to find any, so Im just hoping for the best.
